fashion.description: A feminine fashion inspired by Victorian and Rococo styles, featuring frills, lace, and petticoats.
A casual and princess-like style with soft colors and girly silhouettes, often inspired by fairy tales.
A glamorous and over-the-top gyaru style featuring tiaras, big hair, and lots of pink.
A rebellious style characterized by black clothing, dark makeup, and a punk rock influence.
A bright and colorful fashion inspired by decora and Harajuku street style, featuring layers and accessories.
A substyle of Lolita that mixes masculine and feminine elements with tailored jackets and waistcoats.
A bold, glamorous fashion featuring heavy makeup, tanned skin, and dramatic clothing.
A darker, more elegant variation of Gyaru that combines gothic elements with feminine glam.
A casual, street-style subculture that mixes Western clothing with Japanese street fashion.
A style based on the traditional uniforms worn by students in Japan, but with a fashionable twist.
A futuristic, sci-fi-inspired fashion using metallic colors and sleek designs to create a modern look.
A natural and earthy fashion with soft, muted tones and flowing, relaxed silhouettes.
A bright, kitschy style focused on pop culture and '80s/early '90s nostalgia, often layered with toys and accessories.
A substyle of Lolita with a more muted color palette and a focus on historical accuracy.
A style inspired by old European and aristocratic fashion, often featuring ruffled shirts and elegant long coats.
A heavily DIY fashion with a punk edge, often using patches, studs, and torn fabrics to create an anarchy-inspired look.
A cute and sporty fashion often inspired by tennis or school uniforms, incorporating pastel colors and casual elements.
A mature and chic version of Lolita with a focus on darker tones, such as deep reds, blacks, and jewel tones.
A quirky and whimsical fashion style often inspired by retro and vintage Western fashions, with a playful twist.
A military-inspired fashion that mixes historical elements with modern Japanese streetwear, creating structured looks.
